name: Nim: Discovery of the Past
description:
EXPLORE THE OLD - FULFILL A PROMISE

Description

Nim; the main character, has just left his village to fulfill a promise to his friend. Exploring a devastated world where magic and technology merged and created unique civilizations but are now gone, Nim will have to discover relics and magic skills while fighting enemies and discovering plots that are bound to plunge the world into a new war. 

Features

  • Action and Puzzles: you will have to fight but also solve puzzles to discover and reach old relics. 
  • Driven Narrative: you will accompany the main character on his journey to fulfill a promise and discover relics of the old civilizations. But, would you turn out to be a hero? Discover the plots and prevent a new great war. 
  •  Visual Style: Nim: Discovery of the Past, offers a mixture of non-traditional art styles for FPS games. Enjoy the low-poly and the cel-shading style together with a warm and vibrant color palette.

Controls

Keyboard

  • W - Move Forward
  • S - Move Backward
  • A - Move Left
  • D - Move Right
  • Space Bar - Jump
  • Left Shift - Dash
  • E - Pick up  items
  • R- Reload
  • ESC - Pause Game

Mouse

  • Axis - Aim
  • Left Mouse Button - Shoot / Confirm
  • Right Mouse Button - Interact

Program Used

For the development of this game we are using Unreal Engine 5, Adobe PhotoshopInVision, Maya 2022.

Team Credits

  • Bernardo Serrano Bonilla (Game Designer / Project Manager)
  • Gonçalo Simões (Game Artist)
  • André Amaro (Game Developer)

Version Desclaimer

The current alpha version is to test the functionality of the mechanics as well the combat system against the enemies and the design level. Art models and style has not been implemented yet. Next version will have it. Thanks for your understanding.
